name.baseName: Brick production ; Non sintered bricks ; curing process
砖生产;非烧结砖;固化工艺

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Using artificial sand, cement, and water-based drilling chips as raw materials
以人造沙、水泥以及水基钻屑为原材料

quantitativeReference.functionalUnitOrOther: 1t WDC were chosen as the functional unit

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: Involves the preparation of non-fired bricks by adding an appropriate amount of aggregate (i.e., manufactured sand) after the WDC crushing pretreatment. The entire production process includes mixing (time of 2 min), pressing (pressure of 3 MPa; dimension of 240 × 115 × 53 mm), and maintenance steps
包括在 WDC 粉碎预处理后加入适量骨料（即人造砂），制备免烧砖。整个生产过程包括搅拌（时间为 2 分钟）、压制（压力为 3 兆帕；尺寸为 240 × 115 × 53 毫米）和维护步骤
technology.technologicalApplicability: The non-sintered bricks produced using the curing process are commonly applied in the construction industry as an environmentally friendly alternative to traditional fired bricks. These bricks are suitable for a variety of building structures including residential, commercial, and industrial buildings.
使用固化工艺生产的非烧结砖广泛用于建筑行业，作为传统烧制砖的环保替代品。这些砖块适用于包括住宅、商业和工业建筑物在内的多种建筑结构。

LCIMethodAndAllocation.deviationsFromLCIMethodApproaches: The eFootprint online analysis platform developed by IKE Environmental Technology Co. was used to perform quantitative analysis of the full life cycle process, as part of the LCA
作为生命周期评估的一部分，亿科环境技术有限公司开发的 eFootprint 在线分析平台用于对整个生命周期过程进行定量分析。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: Information on the raw materials, energy inputs and pollutant emission data were obtained from Mianyang Building Materials Manufacturing Co., Ltd.
有关原材料、能源投入和污染物排放数据的信息来自绵阳建材制造有限公司。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Liu, W. et al. Comparative life cycle assessment of cement, sintered bricks and non-sintered bricks manufacturing using water-based drilling cuttings from shale gas production in the Sichuan Basin, China. J. Environ. Manage. 314, 115135 (2022).

Liu, W. et al. Comparative life cycle assessment of cement, sintered bricks and non-sintered bricks manufacturing using water-based drilling cuttings from shale gas production in the Sichuan Basin, China. J. Environ. Manage. 314, 115135 (2022).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.samplingProcedure: Besides, 1t WDC were chosen as the functional unit and all the input parameters of raw materials, auxiliary materials, energy consumption, transportation, and direct emissions were calculated in accordance with the functional unit.
此外，选择 1t WDC 作为功能单位，并按照功能单位计算所有原材料、辅助材料、能耗、运输和直接排放的输入参数。
dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When using the data set for the non-fired brick production process, ensure to account for all inputs and outputs associated with 1 ton of WDC as the functional unit. Apply the cut-off rule for low-value materials from upstream processes, such as fly ash, which allows omitting substances amounting to less than 1% of the final product's weight from the inventory as per Zhao et al., 2020. Always refer to methodological guidelines for life cycle assessments to maintain consistency and accuracy in the analysis.
使用非烧结砖生产过程的数据集时，请确保将 1 吨 WDC 作为功能单元，对所有输入和输出进行核算。应用来自上游过程的低价值材料的截断规则，例如粉煤灰，根据 Zhao 等人 2020 年的规定，允许在清单中忽略低于最终产品重量 1% 的物质。始终参考生命周期评估的方法论指南，以保持分析的一致性和准确性。

completeness.common:other: The cut-off rule was adopted, meaning that low-value materials from upstream processes weighing less than 1% of the final product (Zhao et al., 2020), such as fly ash, could be ignored in the inventory.
采用了截断规则，这意味着在清单中可以忽略来自上游工序、重量不到最终产品 1%的低价值材料（Zhao 等人，2020 年），如粉煤灰。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
